Example gitignore to exclude the following from source control:

# Compiled source #
###################
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so

# Packages #
############
*.7z
*.dmg
*.gz
*.iso
*.jar
*.rar
*.tar
*.zip

# Logs and databases #
######################
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite

# OS generated files #
######################
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
Icon?
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Sublime Text files
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Sass Cache remove #
#####################
*.sass-cache

# Middleman Specific #
#####################
/.bundle

# Ignore the build directory
/build
